name: Gary Brabham
introduction: Gary Brabham (born 29 March 1961 in Wimbledon, London, England, United Kingdom) is a British-born Australian racing driver who competed in two Formula One races, in 1990, for the Life team, dbuting at the United States Grand Prix.  He failed to pre-qualify in one of F1's worst-ever cars, and left the team in disgust after the Brazilian Grand Prix.
